title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6212.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6212.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

These rules are applicable to the process by which a county
board of elections in New York State, in accordance with the provisions of
section
5-506
of the

Election Law, discontinues preparation, use and maintenance of registration
poll records and prepares, uses and maintains instead a computer registration
file (hereinafter sometimes referred to as "the file") which includes, inter
alia, a computer-stored image of the signature of each voter and from which the
registration poll list for use at each polling place on election day shall be
produced. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6212.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
